184959482.review:
god what can i even say about this game...
before i played Chicken Farm 2K17, i was depressed, suicidal, and downright ugly. i was rotting my life away as a jobless discord ekitten, when i saw this game pop up. i thought to myself, "why not?" and i quickly installed this game. i was instantly hooked to Chicken Farm 2K17. it was like i found my soulmate in this game.
 the gameplay is simple, yet it captivates the mind's interest easily. i can say with full confidence that i see 
myself playing this game for years to come. Chicken Farm 2K17's developer has taken great care in the development of this game. every single detail of Chicken Farm 2K17 is well thought out and planned, and the game will awe you with its intricacy. Chicken Farm 2K17's mechanics are easy to learn, howver there are many mechanics that keep you invested in the game, and you will be hooked for hours on end. i believe that this game should have won GOTY, and i will keep on reccomending this game til the day i pass. 11/10
